Text:
This is made for people who own minecraft, and as such it isn't a crack of any kind.

I have no real intention to offer support of any kind, although I could take requests for other builds and they may or may not be made at some point.

Thanks very much ! I bought Minecraft for my daughter and myself and have been looking for ways to spiffy it up. This stuff looks like a ton of fun to add. Now to figure out how to take it all and get it running on my server XD Thanks again !

Cheers
great upload, but is it really just 1.8? most of these have 1.8.1 versions already. if you have that, please upload that kit please, thanks.

@raven49

it's 1.8.1.  Thanks for the correct.  First torrent :)

Hey MCModding thanks for giving me a shout back. I spent a bit of time crawling through forums and what not looking for ways to make the magic happens but your absolutely right, no such luck. Still very cools mods either way. I wish they could get some sort of unified way to add mods built into this game sooner rather than later.
wtf there is no minecraft file to load

@Jayzen_Freeze

Just use the regular launcher you can download from minecraft.net.

I've been playing around with your modpack and its brilliant by the way, just a bit complicated. you think you can upload this one with Mo' Creatures and Creeps and Weirdoes? Im not so sure with my modding skills you see.

i can only do the little stuff like the mod which lets me chop the whole of a tree by only hitting the roots :P many thanks if you could upload it with the creature mods mentioned above!

hey wuts up, this upload is awesome, didnt had luck trying to install this mods manually , but u made my dream come true xD, i loaded it and it worked, but dont hav any sound! not any, im sure its not my pc, plz hlp
my sound doesn't work , any idea how to fix it ?
Same here, no sound. Game freezes if I try to click the sound controls. Might be something to do with a new sound API that IC2 has implemented, but im not an expert.
